fields.name: algorithm_name
fields.description: The name of the DSP class (e.g., 'SimpleEq', 'PhaseVocoder').

fields.name: processing_domain
fields.description: Helps the AI distinguish between per-sample processing and spectral blocks.

fields.name: latency_samples
fields.description: Crucial for delay compensation logic in the plugin wrapper.

fields.name: simd_optimized
fields.description: Flags if the code uses AVX/SSE instructions, requiring specific compiler flags.
